Name:
USS AVG-22[1]
HMS Searcher(D20)’
SS Captain Theo
SS Oriental Banker
Fate:
Transferred to the Royal Navy

Returned to the US Navy in 1945
Listed for disposal on 7 February 1946
Sold to J & A T Vatis in 1952

Sold to Tung Chao Yung in 1966
Scrapped on 21 April 1976 in Taiwan
Owner:
J & A T Vatis
Tung Chao Yung
Class and type:
Bogue-class escort carrier (USA)
Ruler-class escort carrier (UK)
Displacement:
As Searcher: 14,400 tons
As Captain Theo: 7129 tons
As Oriental Banker: 10542 tons[3]
Armament:
2 × 4"/50, 5"/38 or 5"/51 guns
4 × twin 40 mm Bofors
20 × single 20 mm Oerlikon
